Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-12818 affecting package postgresql for versions less than 14.20-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-12818 affecting package postgresql for versions less than 14.20-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package postgresql is earlier than 14.20-1, affected by CVE-2025-12818
